text:
The HTTP Sampler has the, very useful, option to filter embedded resources using a regex or IP. However, it is not possible to set a global filter using the HTTP Requests Defaults Control - this would be very useful and prevent needless repetition. 

The HTTP Request Defaults Control only allows the checkbox 'Retrieve all embedded resources from HTML files' to be selected and does not include 'Embedded URLs must match:'.
